label: SupplyChainTradeTransaction
comment: A group of supply chain trade line items, trade agreement, trade delivery and trade settlement details.

datatypeProperties.comment: A trade agreement header applicable to this supply chain trade transaction, such as payment or delivery terms.
A trade delivery header applicable to this supply chain trade transaction.
The trade settlement header applicable to this supply chain trade transaction.
A document line associated with this line trade settlement.
A collection of data that reports the result of a financing request.
A referenced norm or requirement that establishes uniform criteria, methods, processes and practices, such as in engineering or technical areas.
The Uniform Resource Locator (URL) of the web location of the document for this supply chain trade transaction.
Delivery scheduling details included in a defined forecast period for this supply chain trade transaction.
A textual or coded description, such as a remark or additional information.
A product group included in this supply chain trade transaction.
A supply chain trade line item included in this logistics package.
An issue date, time, date time or other date time value for this declared error.
The unique identifier assigned by the sales agent to identify this supply chain trade transaction.
The sender-recipient sequence identifier for this supply chain trade transaction.
An identifier, such as the Unique Consignment Reference (UCR), for the shipment which is the subject of this supply chain trade transaction.

referencedBy.comment: A supply chain trade transaction related to this specified assessment.
